findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification may expose a party to significant financial risk in case of breaches or claims arising from the use of Confidential Information.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability to fees paid may not adequately protect against substantial losses or damages resulting from breaches of the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability under this Agreement is limited to the total fees paid hereunder.

findings.rationale: The lack of audit rights may hinder the ability to verify compliance with the NDA, increasing the risk of undisclosed breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Automatic renewal may lead to unintended obligations, especially if one party is unaware of the renewal terms or no longer wishes to continue the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement automatically renews for additional terms unless terminated by either party.

findings.rationale: The absence of intellectual property provisions may lead to disputes regarding ownership and usage of any intellectual property developed during the agreement.
